disclaimerDescription.html:
GST comprises of both Central GST & State GST. For details, kindly refer the tax invoice shared on your email id. 

A Non-refundable convenience fee of INR 149 per pax sector for Domestic and INR 299 per pax per sector for international has been levied on all online payments mode except Credit Shell. For payment in currencies other than INR, refer to the fare breakdown in the price summary.
